page.description: Sorts a CRLF delimited list so that the entries are in the same order as the entries in a reference list
page.syntax: Sorted_List as C = SortList_On_ReferenceList(C list ,C reference_list )

argument.name: reference_list
argument.description: The list that defines the sort sequence to be applied.

page.discussion: The SortList_On_ReferenceList() function allows you to sort a list in a manner defined by a Reference_List. The Reference_List must contain the entries found in List or they will not be sorted.

section.title: Example
section.description: In this example list_all contains j, c, and z.
section.example: list_all = <<%a% a z c b j %a% list_selected = comma_to_crlf("j,c,z") ? SortList_On_ReferenceList(list_selected,list_all) = z c j

section.description: In this example list_all contains only j.
section.example: list_all = <<%a% a z c b j %a% list_selected = comma_to_crlf("j,ce,za") ? SortList_On_ReferenceList(list_selected,list_all) = j
